Class DataStorage

java.lang.Object
internship_management_system.model.DataStorage
public class DataStorage extends Object
Class to all data DataStorage will store all data types in static lists

  • Method Details

    • newStudent

      public static Student newStudent(String userID, String name, int yearOfStudy, String major, String email)
      Create a new Student and add to the list id is auto-incremented based on list size
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID of the student, used for login
      name - the name of the student
      yearOfStudy - the year of study of the student
      major - the major of the student
      email - the email of the student
      Returns:
      the newly created Student object

    • newCompanyRep

      public static CompanyRepresentative newCompanyRep(String name, String companyName, String department, String position, String email)
      Create a new Company Representative and add to the list id is auto-incremented based on list size userID is autogenerated as "CR" + id
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the company representative
      companyName - the company name of the company representative
      department - the department of the company representative
      position - the position of the company representative
      Returns:
      the newly created CompanyRepresentative object

    • newCareerCentreStaff

      public static CareerCentreStaff newCareerCentreStaff(String userID, String name, String department, String email)
      Create a new Career Centre Staff and add to the list
      Parameters:
      userID - the user Id of the career centre staff, used for login
      name - the name of the career centre staff
      department - the department of the career centre staff
      email - the email of the career centre staff
      Returns:
      the newly created CareerCentreStaff object

    • newInternshipOpportunity

      public static InternshipOpportunity newInternshipOpportunity(String title, String description, String preferredMajor, InternshipLevel level, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, CompanyRepresentative companyRep, int numOfSlots, boolean visibility)
      Create a new Internship Opportunity and add to the list
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the internship opportunity
      description - the description of the internship opportunity
      preferredMajor - the preferred major for the internship opportunity
      level - the level of the internship opportunity
      openingDate - the opening date of the internship opportunity
      closingDate - the closing date of the internship opportunity
      companyRep - the company representative for the internship opportunity
      numOfSlots - the number of slots available for the internship opportunity
      visibility - the visibility status of the internship opportunity
      Returns:
      the newly created InternshipOpportunity object

    • newInternshipApplication

      public static InternshipApplication newInternshipApplication(InternshipOpportunity opportunity, Student student)
      Create a new Internship Application and add to the list
      Parameters:
      opportunity - the internship opportunity for the application
      student - the student applying for the internship opportunity
      Returns:
      the newly created InternshipApplication object

    • getUserByUserID

      public static Optional<User> getUserByUserID(String userID)
      Get a user (Student, CompanyRep, CareerCentreStaff) by their userID
      Parameters:
      userID - the user ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the User if found, or an empty Optional if not found

    • getInternshipApplications

      public static List<InternshipApplication> getInternshipApplications(InternshipOpportunity opportunity, InternshipApplicationFilterSettings settings)
      Get the list of internship applications for a given opportunity matching the given filter settings
      Parameters:
      opportunity - The opportunity whose applications to retrieve
      settings - The filter settings to apply
      Returns:
      the list of internship applications for the given opportunity matching the filter

    • getInternshipApplications

      public static List<InternshipApplication> getInternshipApplications(Student student, InternshipApplicationFilterSettings settings)
      Get the internship application for a given opportunity and student
      Parameters:
      student - The student who applied
      settings - The filter settings to apply
      Returns:
      the list of internship applications matching the filter for the given student

    • getInternshipApplicationForAnOpportunity

      public static Optional<InternshipApplication> getInternshipApplicationForAnOpportunity(InternshipOpportunity opportunity, Student student)
      Get the internship application for a given opportunity and student
      Parameters:
      opportunity - The internship opportunity
      student - The student who applied
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the internship application if found, or empty if not found
